Trigger You fail a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Seek]

When you look for foes, you notice the slightest of cues. Even though you failed at the triggering check, you automatically sense any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected] creatures in the area where you're Seeking, making them merely @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] to you.
